memberdef.argsstring: (u_long rq_vers, fhandle2 *pfh2, nfs_fh3 *pfh3, nfs_fh4 *pfh4, nfsstat2 *pstatus2, nfsstat3 *pstatus3, nfsstat4 *pstatus4, fsal_attrib_list_t *pattr, fsal_op_context_t *pcontext, cache_inode_client_t *pclient, hash_table_t *ht, int *prc)
memberdef.name: nfs_FhandleToCache

detaileddescription.para: nfs_FhandleToCache: Gets a cache entry using a file handle (v2 or v3) as input.
Gets a cache entry using a file handle (v2 or v3) as input.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] version of the NFS protocol to be used
[OUT] pointer to NFSv2 status or NULL
[OUT] pointer to NFSv3 status or NULL
[OUT] pointer to NFSv4 status or NULL
[OUT] FSAL attributes related to this cache entry
[IN] client's ressources to be used for accessing the Cache Inode
[INOUT] Hash Table used to address the Cache Inode
[OUT] internal status for the request (NFS_REQ_DROP or NFS_REQ_OK)

simplesect.para: a pointer to the related pentry if successful, NULL is returned in case of a failure.

detaileddescription.para: nfs_SetPostOpAttr: Converts FSAL Attributes to NFSv3 PostOp Attributes structure.
Converts FSAL Attributes to NFSv3 PostOp Attributes structure.

simplesect.para: 0 in all cases (making it a void function maybe a good idea)

detaileddescription.para: nfs_SetPreOpAttr: Converts FSAL Attributes to NFSv3 PreOp Attributes structure.
Converts FSAL Attributes to NFSv3 PreOp Attributes structure.
nfs_SetWccData: Sets NFSv3 Weak Cache Coherency structure.
Sets NFSv3 Weak Cache Coherency structure.
nfs_RetryableError: Indicates if an error is retryable or not.
Indicates if an error is retryable or not.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] input Cache Inode Status value, to be tested.

memberdef.argsstring: (fsal_op_context_t *pcontext, exportlist_t *pexport, int version, cache_inode_status_t status, nfsstat2 *pstatus2, nfsstat3 *pstatus3, cache_entry_t *pentry0, post_op_attr *ppost_op_attr, cache_entry_t *pentry1, fsal_attrib_list_t *ppre_vattr1, wcc_data *pwcc_data1, cache_entry_t *pentry2, fsal_attrib_list_t *ppre_vattr2, wcc_data *pwcc_data2)
memberdef.name: nfs_SetFailedStatus

detaileddescription.para: nfs4_FSALattr_To_Fattr: Converts FSAL Attributes to NFSv4 Fattr buffer.
Converts FSAL Attributes to NFSv4 Fattr buffer.

parameterdescription.para: [OUT] NFSv4 attributes bitmap to the Fattr buffer.

xrefdescription.para: : not the right answer, actual quotas should be implemented
: not the right answer, actual quotas should be implemented

detaileddescription.para: nfs3_Sattr_To_FSALattr: Converts NFSv3 Sattr to FSAL Attributes.
Converts NFSv3 Sattr to FSAL Attributes.
nfs2_FSALattr_To_Fattr: Converts FSAL Attributes to NFSv2 attributes.
Converts FSAL Attributes to NFSv2 attributes.
nfs4_SetCompoundExport
This routine fills in the pexport field in the compound data.

parameterdescription.para: [OUT] pointer to compound data to be used.

simplesect.para: NFS4_OK if successfull. Possible errors are NFS4ERR_BADHANDLE and NFS4ERR_WRONGSEC.

detaileddescription.para: nfs4_FhandleToExId
This routine extracts the export id from the filehandle

parameterdescription.para: [IN] pointer to file handle to be used.
[OUT] pointer to buffer in which found export id will be stored.

detaileddescription.para: nfs4_stringid_split: Splits a domain stamped name in two different parts.
Splits a domain stamped name in two different parts.
utf82str: converts a UTF8 string buffer into a string descriptor.
Converts a UTF8 string buffer into a string descriptor.
str2utf8: converts a string buffer into a UTF8 string descriptor.
Converts a string buffer into a UTF8 string descriptor.
nfs4_NextSeqId: compute the next nfsv4 sequence id.
Compute the next nfsv4 sequence id.
nfs_bitmap4_to_list: convert an attribute's bitmap to a list of attributes.
Convert an attribute's bitmap to a list of attributes.
nfs4_list_to_bitmap4: convert a list of attributes to an attributes's bitmap.
Convert a list of attributes to an attributes's bitmap.
nfs3_FSALattr_To_Fattr: Converts FSAL Attributes to NFSv3 attributes.
Converts FSAL Attributes to NFSv3 attributes.
nfs2_Sattr_To_FSALattr: Converts NFSv2 Set Attributes to FSAL attributes.
Converts NFSv2 Set Attributes to FSAL attributes.
nfs4_Fattr_Check_Access: checks if attributes have READ or WRITE access.
Checks if attributes have READ or WRITE access.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] access to be checked, either FATTR4_ATTR_READ or FATTR4_ATTR_WRITE

detaileddescription.para: nfs4_Fattr_Check_Access_Bitmap: checks if attributes bitmaps have READ or WRITE access.
Checks if attributes have READ or WRITE access.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] access to be checked, either FATTR4_ATTR_READ or FATTR4_ATTR_WRITE

detaileddescription.para: nfs4_Fattr_Supported: Checks if an attribute is supported.
Checks if an attribute is supported.
nfs4_Fattr_Supported: Checks if an attribute is supported.
Checks if an attribute is supported.
nfs4_Fattr_cmp: compares 2 fattr4 buffers.
Compares 2 fattr4 buffers.

simplesect.para: TRUE if attributes are the same, FALSE otherwise, but -1 if RDATTR_ERROR is set

detaileddescription.para: nfs4_Fattr_To_FSAL_attr: Converts NFSv4 attributes buffer to a FSAL attributes structure.
Converts NFSv4 attributes buffer to a FSAL attributes structure.

simplesect.para: 1 if successful, 0 if not supported, -1 if argument is badly formed

detaileddescription.para: nfs4_Errno: Converts a cache_inode status to a nfsv4 status.
Converts a cache_inode status to a nfsv4 status.
nfs3_Errno: Converts a cache_inode status to a nfsv3 status.
Converts a cache_inode status to a nfsv3 status.

xrefdescription.para: : Check if this works by making stress tests

detaileddescription.para: nfs2_Errno: Converts a cache_inode status to a nfsv2 status.
Converts a cache_inode status to a nfsv2 status.
nfs4_AllocateFH: Allocates a buffer to be used for storing a NFSv4 filehandle.
Allocates a buffer to be used for storing a NFSv4 filehandle.

simplesect.para: NFS4_OK if successful, NFS3ERR_SERVERFAULT, NFS4ERR_RESOURCE or NFS4ERR_STALE otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: nfs4_MakeCred
This routine fills in the pcontext field in the compound data.

parameterdescription.para: [INOUT] pointer to compound data to be used. NOT YET IMPLEMENTED

briefdescription.para: A set of functions used to managed NFS.
